CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 5, 1955, pg. 1A, reads: "Promoted - With Mayor David L. Lawrence administering the oath of office, Wednesday, Karl O. Jackson, left, became a police lieutenant, and, Albert L. Mills and Matthew Geis, right, became city detectives, as, left to right, City Councilman Paul F. Jones, Mrs. Sarah Kirk, Thirteenth Ward Democratic chairman and alderman; Public Safety Director David Olbum and Police Superintendent James W. Slusser observe. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence swearing in city detectives Albert Laverne Mills and Matthew Geis, in Pittsburgh City Council Chambers at the City County Building
